DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn nutrition-related change identify biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor predict woman 's risk develop breast cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study look nutrition-related biomarkers predict breast cancer risk woman .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrition-Related Biomarkers Predicting Breast Cancer Risk Women
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To complete characterization metabolic serotypes base metabolome , adapt profile human epidemiological study . - To determine extent metabolic profile reflective independent long-term caloric intake predict breast cancer risk nest case-control study . - To identify critical serum metabolite . OUTLINE : Laboratory study , include metabolome profiling high performance liquid chromatography ; small molecule identification mass spectroscopy , perform previously collect blood sample .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : Confirmed breast cancer diagnose least 2 year blood sample collection ( case ) No prior diagnosis cancer Healthy participant ( control ) Enrolled Nurses ' Health Study Banked blood sample available Hormone receptor status specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Menopausal status specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
